Posts.Content: I have been on taxol since Nov 2018. It clear up my bone metastasis but it’s not working on my ascites. Hair started thinning, very tired, neuropathy in finger tips and toes. Food taste like metal, heartburn some nausea ( it started last week for the first time just one day). Onc said I would be on chemo indefinitely. Very sad. I continue to work three days a week and exercise. I also have A port. Take care blessings be unto you.
Posts.Title: Life on Taxol

Posts.Content: Hilltopper1 I am stage 4 mbc ( her 2 positive ) since 10/1/2013. I live in the Pittsburg, ca. Area. I am currently on taxol chemo therapy. (Since Nov 2018) When I started this journey I was on arimidex and it worked very well for 4 years. Then it stopped working in Aug 2017. The cancer returned and I took ibrance, falslodex, xelodo, vercenzio now on chemo. Tell your daughter to stay positive and get a 2nd Opinion. I currently am NEd no more bone Mets. But I have ascites in my stomach( cancer fluid surrounding my stomach area. The onc is treating it with taxol.
